snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include an essay on the way we sign e-mails, an experiment using robots made from toothbrushes and an advice story...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include an essay on the way we sign e-mails, an experiment using robots made from toothbrushes and an advice story from the chief of an online real estate company.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Swarming Robots and Competing Taxis
